oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: SAML authentication bypass with XML signature wrapping in GitHub Enterprise (January 31, 2017)
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: A CRITICAL issue was identified that allows an attacker to bypass SAML authentication. The vulnerability is applicable if the attacker has access to a validly signed SAML assertion or response against the configured Verification certificate. When applicable, an attacker can sign in as any user, including administrators.
